info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 10 at 2:04PM MST until August 10 at 3:45PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON FOR WEST CENTRAL MOHAVE COUNTY... At 204 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rainfall ended shortly after 1 PM around Dolan Springs and Pierce Ferry Road. Between 0.75 and 1.5 inches of rain fell over that area. Flash flooding is ongoing in the warned area. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar and automated gauges. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Dolan Springs and Pierce Ferry And Antares Roads. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR AND GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
